name: Francisco ALVARO-VELASCO, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES; Arturo Montes Benavides, petitioner, v. United States; Juan Castro-Castro, aka Jorge Castro-Valdes, aka Jorge Castro-Valdez, aka Juan Jose Rivera-Castro, petitioner, v. United States; Jose Prudencio Canales-Bonilla, petitioner, v. United States; Edwin Garrido, aka Edwin Garrido-Arriaga, petitioner, v. United States; Daniel Gonzalez-Bautista, petitioner, v. United States; Jose Lara-Gracia, petitioner, v. United States; Elder Rocael Tzacir-Garcia, petitioner, v. United States; and Helber Valdez, aka Helber Valdez Carrion, petitioner, v. United States.

casebody.head_matter:
Francisco ALVARO-VELASCO, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES; Arturo Montes Benavides, petitioner,
v.
United States; Juan Castro-Castro, aka Jorge Castro-Valdes, aka Jorge Castro-Valdez, aka Juan Jose Rivera-Castro, petitioner,
v.
United States; Jose Prudencio Canales-Bonilla, petitioner,
v.
United States; Edwin Garrido, aka Edwin Garrido-Arriaga, petitioner,
v.
United States; Daniel Gonzalez-Bautista, petitioner,
v.
United States; Jose Lara-Gracia, petitioner,
v.
United States; Juan Morales-Leon, aka Juan L. Morales, petitioner,
v.
United States; Jesus Morales-Sanchez, petitioner,
v.
United States; Carlos Alberto Perez-De Leon, petitioner,
v.
United States; Elder Rocael Tzacir-Garcia, petitioner,
v.
United States; and Helber Valdez, aka Helber Valdez Carrion, petitioner,
v.
United States.
No. 16-8058.
Supreme Court of the United States
May 14, 2018.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit for further consideration in light of Sessions v. Dimaya, 584 U.S. ----, 138 S.Ct. 1204, 200 L.Ed.2d 549 (2018).
